Welcome ! Shalom!
Julie Vivienne is a Christian singer, worship minister ,speaker and TV and Radio host with Life Com Broadcasting Network UK (LCBNTV and LifeCom Radio) She is also a Christian candidate with the Christian Peoples Alliance UK
.Home - Christian Peoples Alliance (cpaparty.net)
After standing as a candidate for the Christian Peoples Alliance in Bournemouth West in the 2024 General Election, Julie formed Christian Action Dorset where Christians from across the county of Dorset from all Christian denominations can unite in praise, prayer and proclamation of The Gospel , standing for Biblical principals and ethics, and bringing counselling and prayer support as well as physical provisions for those in need. For regular info and updates on Christian Action Dorset email Julie at: christianactiondorset@gmail.com
Follow Christian Action Dorset on Facebook.
For all other bookings as a singer, musician and/or speaker, email Julie at julie.vivienne@julie-vivienne.com
Subscribe to Julie's YouTube Channel for music, Bible Teaching and Interviews.
JULIE VIVIENNE
Committed Christian Julie Vivienne is a wife and a mother , an evangelistic speaker, Bible teacher, worship minister , Christian politician and candidate with The Christian Peoples Alliance UK. She helps lead worship at monthly prayer rallies with Christian Voice UK . She is a Soprano singer ,pianist, and flautist. She is a Christian TV Host on LCBNTV
Hear Julie both sing and speak on her YouTube Channel with many playlists covering singing, worship, music , Bible Teaching, Christian politics and interviews discussing the Biblical teaching on critical issues such as creation, abortion, euthanasia and the Biblical education of our children.
Julie is a strong advocate for the sanctity of all human life from conception in the womb to a natural death. She strongly proclaims the Biblical Truth that GOD created the universe in six days around 6,000 years ago and that all human beings are created either male or female in God's image. She strongly opposes the teaching of evolution, all so called "gender fluidity" and the indoctrination of our children by a woke agenda in our schools.
With Jewish ancestry, Julie has a passion for Jewish people to know The LORD Jesus Christ or Yeshua Hamashiach in Hebrew, as their Messiah and loves Israel.
Shalom.

Julie's Online Music School
Service Description
Julie's Online Music School presents a unique opportunity for aspiring singers and musicians to hone their craft from the comfort of their own homes. Our comprehensive curriculum covers two essential pillars of musical proficiency: Singing Technique and Coaching, as well as Music Theory. Singing Technique and Coaching: Through a series of engaging video tutorials, Julie guides students through the fundamentals of vocal technique, helping them develop strength, flexibility, and control in their singing. Laying a firm foundation for any genre and style of singing, Julie will teach you how to support your voice from the diaphragm and develop a solid vocal technique suitable for casual to professional vocal practice, Julie's expert coaching empowers students to unlock their true vocal potential and express themselves with confidence and clarity. Music Theory: Delve into the language of music with Julie's insightful lessons on Music Theory. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced musician, Julie breaks down complex concepts such as harmony, rhythm, scales, and chords into digestible and practical insights. Through clear explanations, interactive exercises, and real-world examples, students gain a deeper understanding of music's inner workings, enabling them to read, write, and interpret music with fluency and precision. Join Julie's Online Music School today and embark on a journey of musical discovery and growth. Whether you're a budding vocalist or a curious music enthusiast, our accessible and engaging video tuition will equip you with the knowledge and skills you need to thrive in your musical endeavours. Whether you just want to develop your own understanding of music or you want to take music theory exams Julie can help you on your musical journey.

About Julie
Julie graduated from The Royal Academy Of Music London in 1990
Julie began public speaking in 1977 when she recited a poem she wrote for the Silver Jubilee of Queen Elizabeth The Second which was also published in the local paper
She is in demand as a soprano soloist throughout the UK for opera, oratoria, musicals, concerts and various functions ;as well as recording ,teaching and examining the performing arts. Her operatic roles include Santuzza in Mascagni's Cavalleria Rusticana,Maguerite in Gounod's Faust. Amelia in Verdi's A Masked Ball and The Governess in Britten's Turn of The Screw.
She has sung in numerous oratoria and sacred works including Handel's Messiah and Orff's Carmina Burana. Often in demand for German Lieder Julie sings for The Stoltz Society in London and has sung R. Strauss's Four Last Songs with orchestra three times.
Julie sings songs by Gershwin, Cole Porter and the well loved songs from popular musicals.
In 2006 Julie was awarded the East Dorset Award for Outstanding Achievement for raising thousands of pounds for local charities in concerts and running music groups for young children including those with special needs.
In April 2010 she reached the semi final masterclasses of The Dame Kiri Te Kanawa Opera Prize on Radio 2.
David Gillard MBE, Opera Critic for the Daily Mail writes:
"It has been a real pleasure to hear Julie at Jon Andrew’s Silhouette Opera concerts singing taxing arias by Mascagni, Verdi and Puccini – including the extremely challenging ‘In Questa Reggia’ from ‘Turandot’. She met every challenge with total assurance. Her powerful, warm and flexible voice is combined with a highly dramatic stage presence – always a winning combination. I wish her well in what I am sure will be an exciting future."
https://soundcloud.com/julie-vivienne/julie-vivienne-singing-puccinis-vissi-darte-from-tosca
A born again evangelical Christian, Julie is an experienced worship leader and Psalmist. She is also a Teacher of The Bible and preacher of The Gospel.
Since 2020 Julie has been hosting a weekly live television programme on LCBN UK TV. You can join her live every Wednesday morning at 9.30 a.m UK time for Bible Teaching , Interviews or Worship and Prayer via the LCBNTV UK website or app, or on Freeview channel 271, or on YouTube and other internet formats such as Facebook TV, Instagram Twitter and TikTok.
